title: zigbinops
description: The `zigbinops` help patch describes a collection of signal-rate Pure Data objects from the zexy library. These objects perform various mathematical operations like absolute value (`abs~`, `absgn~`) and signum (`sgn~`), as well as binary comparisons (`<~`, `==~`, `>~`) and logical operations (`&&~`, `||~`) on incoming signals. They are fundamental tools for signal processing within Pure Data.
